availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Thomas Worthington (President of the Board of Curators of Kentucky University)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer and curator. Kentucky native. Son of James Worthington. Married to Johana Theresa Gill Worthington. Father of James T. Worthington, “Hood” Worthington, Theresa Worthington, Charles Worthington, Union Worthington, and Frank W. Worthington. Farmer in Boyle County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850. Farmer in Boyle County in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1860. President of the board of curators of Kentucky University in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, District 2, p. 375B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, District 2, p. 611 (p. 21 of microfilm).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, p. 906.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, p. 157A (p. 21 of microfilm).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Precinct 3, p. 213A.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll # 7020615: All Counties, Boyle County Deaths, File #3184.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #994028: Bath, Bell, Boone, Bourbon, Boyd, Boyle County Deaths, p. 923 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Charles Thomas Worthington (1819-1876)," Memorial 44549153, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44549153 (accessed December 18, 2019).
